title: S2 Ep28: Surviving the hungry season
itunes:title: Surviving the hungry season
description: For small farmers the most difficult months of the years are the “hungry season” before the harvest. What would be the effect of a small loan at this time? A program in Zambia tweaked the rules of microfinance. Günther Fink and Kelsey Jack tell Tim Phillips about what happened.
itunes:author: VoxDev.org
dc:creator: VoxDev.org
